node.text:
Brunch is a wonderful excuse to sleep in and laze about in the middle of the day with a few cocktails and of course go ahead and satiate all that breakfast cravings you may have. Make up royally for all the missed breakfasts this past week at the Sunday Brunch in The Raviz Kovalam.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
